comments.content:
This isn't postgresql only, I hit it here also:

http://logs.openstack.org/21/62621/2/check/check-tempest-dsvm-full/30d9ded/console.html
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content: Is this still a problem?  If so, we need to get a fingerprint for logstash.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content:
In the linked logs, json was ok but xml failed, so definitely a timing issue.

However, not seeing any hits in the gate in the last 7 days on this:

http://logstash.openstack.org/#

http://logstash.openstack.org/#

This shows up a lot though:

message:"libvirtError: Unable to write to monitor: Broken pipe" AND filename:"logs/screen-n-cpu.txt" AND build_queue:"gate"

http://logstash.openstack.org/#
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem
